name: Angry Satan
description: This is the crown of the daughter of the King of Demons, Julianne, because Julianne is so innocent, the King of Demons worried that she would not be in charge of the Demon Kingdom, and sent someone to build her a crown that looked very unpleasant. And gave the crown an unpleasant name, angry Satan.
